course_description: This course is designed to provide you with a thorough understanding of important empirical research in capital markets, and to prepare you for independent research projects that could potentially lead to your dissertation. The primary focus would be on methodological issues, although the empirical results in the papers that we cover would be interesting in their own right.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: Th 1pm-4pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W520
sections: Class Nbr: 6256, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-4p, Instructor: W. Mann, Status: Open
